CustomField.description: In the corporate currency, the total amount of scheduled revenue within the relevant time period.
CustomField.formula: pse__Corp_Equal_Split_Milestone_S__c + pse__Corp_Equal_Split_Project_S__c + pse__Corp_Eva_S__c + pse__Corp_Milestone_S__c + pse__Corp_Percent_Complete_Milestone_S__c + pse__Corp_Percent_Complete_Milestone_U__c + pse__Corp_Percent_Complete_Project_S__c + pse__Corp_Percent_Complete_Project_U__c
CustomField.inlineHelpText: In the corporate currency, the total amount of scheduled revenue within the relevant time period.
CustomField.label: Corp: Scheduled Total
